short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes some annyoing things about the Twitter web app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fixes some annyoing things about the Twitter web app.

At the moment, all this does in removing promoted tweets. If you have other suggestions, feel free to create a Github issue at this extensions github repository.
